text:
Just a brief note to acknowledge your thought-provoking reaction to
Leslie Karens* proposal for a National Educational Badio and Otele-
vision Week. You have raised some very good points and as soon as
I have received the comments from scans of the others Harry passed
this on to 1*11 be in touch with Mr. Barcus. And, naturally, 1*11
keep you and the others informed*
Cordially,
Harold E. Hill
Administrative Vice President
HEH:jl
